title: Process for the Licence/Server decommissioning
description:
General


This article describes the process of server/license decommissioning and steps that clients should follow for the official stop of Licence use.


Steps:


1) If the customer decided to stop use the license (on a dedicated or hosted server/environment) or cancel the subscription, he should create a ticket on support@sippysoft.com with a formal request to start the process of server/license decommissioning.

2) Sippy Support Department forwards the received request to a sales/billing department for the approval of the received request.
On this stage, system should still be up and the license should be in a working state for the identification and deletion of a right license. Correct KVM credentials should be shared with Sippy Support Department for the decommissioning of a license.
Please be aware, decommissioning of license/server means the deletion/format of data & license. So backup for future use should be agreed beforehand with a sales department & support.
